title: Internet not working , requires a restart multiple times a day
content:
Internet stops working multiple times a day. Requires restart, works for some time and then stops working again. Have been facing problems with incoming/outgoing calls as well.

The fact that it starts working after restart tells me that the issue is with the phone and not my Sim card/service provider.

Multiple restarts a day for such basic feature to work is very frustrating. Please look into this.
